Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

The nurse’s first responsibility is to the patient; therefore, to protect the patient from the risk of infection, you must inform your team member that the glove is no longer sterile. Insertion of a Foley catheter is a sterile procedure.

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: SAFE AND EFFECTIVE CARE ENVIRONMENT 11
